description:
The crew sets off! It`s a wide world full of adventure, and first up it`s off to the village of the animal people, where a princess is being forced into a marriage she wants no part in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der König der Morgendämmerung und die gefangene Braut
Le roi de l`aube et la mariée captive
The King of Dawn and the Imprisoned Bride
Yoake no Ou to Toraware no Hanayome
夜明けの王と囚われの花嫁
